Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Provides for a special election, at the discretion of the governor, to fill vacancies in the office of comptroller and attorney-general
Summary: Provides for a special election, at the discretion of the governor, to fill vacancies in the office of comptroller or attorney-general.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to vacancies in the office of comptroller or attorney-general
